name: Dungeon Sprint
description:
A perma-death, hardcore, hack and slash roguelike with 10 races and 10 classes. Fight your way through 20 levels to escape the Dwarven prison. Face 67 unique monsters and employ over 100 different items. Overcome hunger, thirst, fatigue and swarms of enemies or die embarrassingly over and over.

Check the readme file for detailed instructions and an overview of the game mechanics.
